content: CREATE TABLE CPI_study_log(log_id int(10) Not Null,log_id int(10) Not Null, begin_time timestamp, end_time timestamp);         [SQL commands]|Select more than one column| SELECT column_name1,column_name2 FROM table_name; |Select all columns|SELECT * FROM table_name;|Select unique valuesSELECT DISTINCT column_name FROM table_name;
